title: Subpart 8186-24 - 1989 Market Value Survey Procedures
content:
Subpart 8186-24 - 1989 Market Value Survey Procedures

State Regulations
§ 8186-24.1 - Definitions
§ 8186-24.2 - Market value surveys, generally
§ 8186-24.3 - Valuation date; taxable status date
§ 8186-24.4 - Designation of base year rolls
§ 8186-24.5 - Preparation of classified roll
§ 8186-24.6 - Stratification of ordinary classes and large units
§ 8186-24.7 - Appraisal of sample parcels in ordinary classes and large units
§ 8186-24.8 - Stratification of the utility class and appraisal of sample parcels
§ 8186-24.9 - Computation of estimated market value ratio
§ 8186-24.10 - Supplemental sample
§ 8186-24.11 - Corrections to the survey data
§ 8186-24.12 - Methodology for stratification of sampled classes
§ 8186-24.13 - Alternative procedures for a village assessing unit in Nassau County which is not a homestead assessing unit
§ 8186-24.14 - Completion of survey

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
